a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Changes in UK butterfly populations, All UK resident species
Changes in butterfly populations are measured as an index relative to populations in their start year (1976 or 1990
Data source: UK Office for National Statistics; Department for Environment, Food & Rural Affairs
Note: Year-to-year fluctuations in butterfly numbers are often linked to natural environmental variation, especially weather (unsmoothed
index). We therefore used a smoothed index to understand underlying patterns of change.
